featured.text: They would carry their supplies in backpacks each weighing up to fifty pounds; it usually took at least 40 trips to get everything to the top and over the pass.

definition.zh_def: 背包，一種用於攜帶物品的袋子，通常有肩帶，可以背在背上。
definition.en_def: A backpack is a bag carried on the back, typically with two shoulder straps, used for carrying items.
definition.example: She packed her books and lunch into her backpack before heading to school.
